content:
# The error indicates that there was nothing within reach to harvest, which suggests that I may not have moved close enough to the iron ore patch or that the harvesting action is not correctly targeting the resource.
#
# To resolve this, I will ensure that I am positioned directly over the iron ore patch before attempting to harvest again. 
# I will move to a position that is clearly within the bounds of the iron ore patch.

# Let's move to the center of the iron ore patch to ensure we are in the correct position for harvesting.
move_to(iron_ore_patch.bounding_box.center)
